name: DOSSIP.net
description:
Welcome to the MetaFirst!

Looking to chat with some old friends, or maybe even meet some new ones? Originally released in 1989 Dossip used to be the only place where you could chat in stunning 3D! 

Dossip is the first (citation needed) three-dimensional "Metaverse" from the past, available NOW in the present. (for windows compatible PCs) 
In Dossip you can be who you want to be, chat to complete strangers, roam and explore secrets in the most advanced graphics late 90s had to offer all without leaving the comfort of your library's intranet. 

Now, years after its release, the servers are finally being shutdown. Hundreds of users log online to chat one last time.

 Join others in their last Dossip gossips and log in today.



Install instructions:
1. Download the zip file.
2. Extract the folder.
3. Run the .exe inside.
4. Enjoy and tell us what you think!

Made by: HAID, EPICGameGuy& Chae

Chat text by: HAID, pollen, Chae, EPICGameGuy, Jessabela, Jazz,  monkeylard  & Calum Special thanks to the Polycool. !!!NOTE!!!
Made for the Dying MMO Jam

Dossip is not actually online (YET?!), all usernames, messages and fun is just a very artificially generated simulation, any similarities to real people or real messages is completely by random chance. None of this is real, not even you.
